title: PLEASE SUGGESTIONS/HELP!!!!!!
body: I screwed up...i wanted to buy some rp with my credit card and it says ive reached my purchase limit with this method.So i went to the closest shop and bought 2 10euro paysafe cards.once i try to redeem i find out paysafe was removed from greek store! then even worse i buy 1 riot code online for rp (riot card) and i find out that its for US region (NA not sure).I am on EUNE and I spent so much money for you riot! rito redeem my codes somehow either the paysafes or the riot cards they are totally useless to me....

replies.body: This is quite a series of unfortunate events, and it sucks that you've gone through such a roller coaster.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our billing team can take a look into your specific issue.  We'll figure something out!

well i added a support ticket and no one was able to help me..it's ok i understand you dont have such an authority but its bad to not be able to use other region codes :/ . thanks for the respond anyway
